name: Hiatus Kaiyote
description: '''Hiatus Kaiyote''' ({{IPAc-en|h|aɪ|ˈ|eɪ|t|ə|s|_|k|eɪ|ˈ|j|oʊ|t|i}} {{respell|hy|AY|təs|_|kay|YOH|tee}}) is an Australian [[jazz]]/[[funk]] band formed in [[Melbourne]] in 2011, made up of singer/guitarist [[Nai Palm]], bassist Paul Bender, keyboardist Simon Mavin, and drummer Perrin Moss. Their albums include ''[[Choose Your Weapon]]'' (2015), ''[[Mood Valiant]]'' (2021), and ''[[Love Heart Cheat Code]]'' (2024).
